room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by Escape in Time in Houston
review: This sucks it’s so dumb and unnecessary. I do not recommend visiting this place at all. I demand a refund!

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by Escape in Time in Houston
review: Great fun! Really great challenge! Love how the owner customized the room to our group! Easy enough to get out in an hour but not too easy to get out quick. We will definitely be back for the new rooms when they launch!

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by Escape in Time in Houston
review: Great experience. The owner was very friendly and personable. I would recommend Escape in Time to anyone and can't wait to go back and try some more rooms there.

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by Escape in Time in Houston
review: My husband and I did the Cabin room and had a blast! It was the perfect mix of puzzles, logic, and design. We’ve done nearly 50 escape rooms and this has easily become one of our favorite places.
